data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rasouli, Hamidreza, Scharf, Burkhard, Meisch, Claude, Aygen, Cem (2016): An updated checklist of the Recent non-marine Ostracoda (Crustacea) of Iran, with a redescription of Eucypris mareotica (Fischer, 1855). Zootaxa 4154 (3): 273-292, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4154.3.3|15 occurrences
